definition: Ba state during Zhou dynasty (in east of modern Sichuan)/abbr. for east Sichuan or Chongqing/surname Ba/abbr. for Palestine or Palestinian/abbr. for Pakistan

to long for/to wish/to cling to/to stick to/sth that sticks/close to/next to/spread open/informal abbr. for bus 巴士[ba1 shi4]/bar (unit of pressure)/nominalizing suffix on certain nouns, such as 尾巴[wei3 ba5], tail

sentences.english: There are two types of PLBs: 'green' amd 'red' minibuses, whose roofs are coloured accordingly.
sentences.chinese: 公共小巴分綠色和紅色兩類，從車頂的顏色可以識別。

sentences.english: This route is operated by Wong Chuk Hang Light Bus Services Co. , Ltd.
sentences.chinese: 本線由黃竹坑小巴服務有限公司經營。

sentences.english: This route is operated by Ap Lei Chau Public Light Bus Co. , Ltd.
sentences.chinese: 本線由鴨脷洲專線小巴有限公司經營。

sentences.english: Heathrow International Airport is a short bus or taxi ride away.
sentences.chinese: 乘小巴或出租汽車便可到達希思羅國際機場。

sentences.english: Battier also spoke about what it was like to be traded this past offseason.
sentences.chinese: 小巴也講了關於上賽季被交易的感覺。

sentences.english: Minibus see sensitive instrument requirements, and give qi works by looking back to escape.
sentences.chinese: 敏儀要求上小巴看看，並把祁望的畫作交還給逸升。

sentences.english: Zhishan station, Citizen minibus 11, around 4 stops.
sentences.chinese: 淡水線芝山站下車，轉乘市民小巴11，約4站即達。

sentences.english: The driver of the minibus was trapped in the vehicle and was rescued by firemen.
sentences.chinese: 小巴司機被困在車內，由消防員救出。

sentences.english: There are two types of PLBs: 'green' and 'red' minibuses, whose roofs are coloured accordingly.
sentences.chinese: 本港有綠色和紅色兩類小巴，從車頂的顏色可以識別。

sentences.english: There are regular boat and minibus services to the beach.
sentences.chinese: 有定期船和小巴服務到海灘。

sentences.english: Then, sitting next to me on the mini-bus ride back to the hotel, he began to interrogate me.
sentences.chinese: 在回賓館的小巴上，他坐到我旁邊，審問開始了。

definition: vehicle that gives one a free ride/(fig.) (ride on sb's) coattails/(take advantage of) an opportunity
bus/abbr. for 公共汽車|公共汽车[gong1 gong4 qi4 che1]/car belonging to an organization and used by its members (government car, police car, company car etc)/abbr. for 公務用車|公务用车[gong1 wu4 yong4 che1]
to ride as a passenger/to travel by (car, plane etc)
(coll.) large bus/coach/(abbr. for 大型巴士)
to ride as a passenger (in a car, boat, plane etc)
public transportation/mass transit/abbr. for 公共交通[gong1 gong4 jiao1 tong1]
motorcycle taxi/abbr. for 摩托車的士|摩托车的士[mo2 tuo1 che1 di1 shi4]
